description: Updates of 1.1.0: add more themes, including the Love Quotes; display spinner when loading.  It's the free version of Quotes Theme. Buy the full version to get more wonderful quotes and remove the ads.  Enjoy colorful quotes! Over 1500+ famous quotes wallpapers in the palm of your hands. Become smarter and wiser every second by reading famous quotes from famous people. We're working hard on add more famous people quotes and funny quotes. Well-organized in diverse themes, such as 'Age Quotes', 'Anger Quotes', 'Art Quotes', 'Business Quotes', 'Change Quotes', 'Computers Quotes', 'Death Quotes', 'Dreams Quotes', 'Education Quotes', 'Equality Quotes', 'Experience Quotes', 'Faith Quotes', 'Forgiveness Quotes', 'Friendship Quotes', 'Funny Quotes', 'Government Quotes', 'History Quotes', 'Humor Quotes', 'Imagination Quotes', 'Intelligence Quotes', 'Life Quotes', 'Love Quotes', 'Marriage Quotes', 'Movies Quotes', 'Music Quotes', 'Nature Quotes', 'Patriotism Quotes', 'Peace Quotes', 'Poetry Quotes', 'Politics Quotes', 'Religion Quotes', 'Science Quotes', 'Society Quotes', 'Sports Quotes', 'Success Quotes', 'Technology Quotes', 'Time Quotes', 'War Quotes', 'Wisdom Quotes', 'Work Quotes'.
